meanings.sent1: I found an old book with a fourscore pages.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had a fourscore balloons for the class party.
meanings.sent3: The fourscore cupcakes were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The fourscore years of friendship showed in their laughter.
meanings.sent5: The fourscore candles on the cake made it hard to blow out.

meanings.definition: a set or group of eighty
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a fourscore ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The store had a fourscore of colorful marbles for sale.
meanings.sent3: The fourscore of ducks waddled in a straight line.
meanings.sent4: The fourscore of stars lit up the night sky beautifully.
meanings.sent5: A fourscore of students attended the field trip to the zoo.
